titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2621) to extend trade authorities procedures with respect to reciprocal trade agreements, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-386, by Mr. Dreier.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2621 with 2 hours of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 130.

action.text: Mr. Solomon asked unanimous consent that H. Res. 309 be laid upon the table. Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/6/1997--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 2621 (reciprocal trade agreement authorities extension).
